summary.span: 表示 的表的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of tables for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含特定 的所有 对象。The contains all the objects for a particular . 若要访问 的 ，请使用 属性。To access the of a , use the property. 使用 、和 等方法来管理集合中的项。The uses methods such as , , and to manage the items in the collection. 使用 方法来确定特定表（由索引或名称指定）是否在集合中。Use the method to determine whether a particular table (specified by either index or name) is in the collection. 若要从一个表导航到另一个表，请使用 的 或 属性访问其 对象的集合。To navigate from one table to another, use the or property of the to access its collection of objects. 你还可以使用 属性在特定 集合中浏览 `DataTables` 的父/子关系。You can also use the property to navigate through the parent/child relationships of the `DataTables` in a particular collection. ## Examples 本示例中的第一个过程检索 的 ，并打印每个表的每一行的值。The first procedure in this example retrieves the of a and prints the value of each column, in each row, of each table. 第二个过程创建一个具有两列的新 ，并将其添加到 中。The second procedure creates a new with two columns, and adds it to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

The newly created .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于未指定名称，因此将使用默认名称创建 `DataTable`，相对于其添加顺序。Because no name is specified, the `DataTable` is created by using a default name, relative to its order of addition. 默认名称为 "Table1"。The default name is "Table1." 将表成功添加到集合时发生 事件。The event occurs when a table is successfully added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例使用不带参数的 方法将三个新的 对象添加到 中。The following example adds three new objects to the using the method without arguments. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入了 `null` 或空字符串（""），则将为新创建的 `DataTable`提供一个默认名称。If either `null` or an empty string ("") is passed in, a default name is given to the newly created `DataTable`. 此名称基于添加表的顺序（"Table1"、"Table2" 等）。This name is based on the order in which the table was added ("Table1", "Table2", and so on). 如果表已成功添加到集合中，则会发生 事件。The event occurs if the table is successfully added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例将具有给定名称的 添加到 中。The following example adds a with the given name to the . summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示集合中是否存在具有指定名称的 对象。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a object with the specified name exists in the collection.

returns.span: 如果存在指定的表，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified table exists; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 对象的名称。You specify the name of the object by using the property. 如果使用 方法将 添加到集合中，不传递任何参数，则将根据添加表的顺序为该表提供默认名称（"Table1"、"Table2" 等）。If you add a to the collection with the method, passing no arguments, the table is given a default name, based on the order in which the table was added ("Table1", "Table2", and so on). 若要获取 的索引，请使用 方法。To get the index of a , use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当两个或多个表的名称相同但命名空间不同时，返回 `false`。Returns `false` when two or more tables have the same name but different namespaces. 如果在将表名只匹配到一个表时存在任何二义性，则该调用不会成功。The call does not succeed if there is any ambiguity when matching a table name to exactly one table. ## Examples 下面的示例测试 中是否存在名为 "供应商" 的表。The following example tests whether a table with the name "Suppliers" exists in the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableCollection.Contains Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在与搜索字符串的大小写匹配的 名称，则返回该名称。If a name exists that matches the case of the search string, it is returned. 否则，将执行不区分大小写的搜索，如果找到与此搜索匹配的 名称，则返回该名称。Otherwise a case-insensitive search is performed, and if a name is found that matches this search, it is returned. 使用 方法来确定具有特定名称或索引的表是否存在。Use the method to determine whether a table with a specific name or index exists. ## Examples 下面的示例从 按名称检索一个表。The following example retrieves a single table by name from the .
